column2: caption=Falco Chubb-Baggins from [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)

column1: '''Falco Chubb-Baggins''' was a cousin of [[Bilbo Baggins]], the son of Bilbo's uncle [[Bingo Baggins]] and [[Chica Chubb]].<ref name="Baggins">{{App
He lived a long life, reaching the age of ninety-six, but not quite long enough to attend his cousin's [[Bilbo's Farewell Party
column2: Farewell Party]], which was held two years after his death. He was survived by a daughter, [[Poppy Chubb-Baggins
column3: Poppy]], but when she married [[Filibert Bolger]] the short-lived [[Chubb-Baggins Family
column4: Chubb-Baggins]] line came to an end.<ref name="Baggins"/>

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Falco, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "Ah, Cousin Falco!".
